name: Love Confessions (Demo)
description:
Miyoru finally has the courage to confess her feelings to her crush. But you don’t know who it is. (Certainly she knows who to confess to... right??) Try to find out who Miyoru is confessing to. (The choice is truly yours)

NOTE: The game is still in development so this is a mini-demo / preview. Future updates are coming real soon! (aka sometime this week)

Current Features:

  • ~5000+ words
  • A cute MC!
  • Two (also cute) Love Interests
  • 2 Routes (unfinished endings) & 1 "bad" ending

Planned/Future Features:

  • Finish the "Confession" ends
  • CGs!!
  • Add additional audio / sfx
  • Add sprites for two potential love interests (one of them appeared in the game, sprite-less)
  • Add routes for the last two LIs
  • Update art assets / sprites / GUI

CREDITS:

Art, Writing, Coding, GUI: Shiyuriaki

Backgrounds: Noraneko Games

Music: Ontama, Yufuruka

SFX: Zapslat
